instructions.welcome: Welcome to Applicant Center! This is your personal site which will assist you through the Background Verification process. To begin, please provide the information required to complete your Background Verification for TAAKD.
instructions.phase1:
This is the first of three distinct phases of the Background Verification process.

You can save your work and exit the application by clicking the ‘Save’ button. This application must be completed and submitted within 7 days of receiving the Background Verification request email. Once you submit your application, you will not be able to make any modifications, and Taakd will start working on your Background Verifications.
instructions.process: While your Background Verification is in process, you may be contacted by Taakd to provide additional information necessary to complete this request. Please respond to any of Taakd’s requests for information as quickly as possible to expedite completion of your Background Verification.

additional.phoneNumber: Please list the best phone number and email address for Taakd to contact you for questions regarding your information.
additional.resume: Have a copy of your resume or CV handy when completing the information.
additional.history: Research your own history, including employment dates, job titles, and salaries, so that you can provide complete and accurate information to Taakd if asked.
additional.addresses: Be prepared to provide your current and past addresses.
additional.education: Locate education transcripts, diplomas, or certificates in advance.
additional.paychecks: Collect past paychecks/payslips and tax documents that can be used to verify your employment.
additional.accessibilityPolicy: To view Taakd’s Website Accessibility Policy, report website accessibility problems, or request accessible services and information, please go to www.Taakd.com/accessibility.

jobRequest.helpCenter: If you need help, you can visit our Candidate Help Center or contact Taakd using Live Help.
jobRequest.privacyPolicy: Taakd is committed to protecting your privacy. Find out more about our privacy policies for your respective regions: US, Canada, EMEA, APAC, and Australia.

reset.accountSetupDescription: Let’s set up your account. All fields below are required.
reset.subscribeTextNotificationsPrompt: Would you like to subscribe to text messages for notifications and password resets?
reset.yesDescription: I acknowledge and agree that I may receive texts for notifications and password resets, and that standard data and text charges may apply.
reset.noDescription: I acknowledge and agree that I may receive texts for notifications and password resets, and that standard data and text charges may apply.

steps.setupAccountDescription: Let’s set up your account. All fields below are required.
steps.saveError: An error occurred while saving data.

login.loginDescription: Let’s log into your account to continue.
login.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
login.shortPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters.
login.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.

step1.required_fields: All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
step1.provide_information: Providing your information accurately and completely will expedite the completion of the background verification process.
step1.name_info: Please provide your name as it appears on your official identification document.
step1.employer_info: The name of your current employer.
step1.dont_middle_name: I do not have a middle name.
step1.certify_no_middle_name: I certify that I do not have a middle name on my official identification document.
step1.date_living_address_info: The date you have been living at the address.
step1.this_is_my_name_column: I certify that this is my current legal name as written on my official identification document *
step1.certify_current_name: I certify that this is my current name.
step1.alias_info: Ignore this section if you don't have any alias names. Please provide: any other names that appear in government ID documents where this name differs from your primary ID name; or a former legal name that may include your maiden name or any official changes to your legal name; or a name you use in a 'formal' capacity.
step1.email_privacy_info: We may occasionally need to contact you to clarify some items in your background verification process. We will not share or sell your email address.
step1.provide_phone_numbers: Please provide your phone numbers. You can add multiple numbers.
step1.identification_info: Most public records are stored using your name and date of birth, so providing this information allows us to accurately search these sources.

step2.required_fields: All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
step2.provide_education_info: Please provide your education and training information starting from the most recent.
step2.enter_name_of_school: Enter the name of your school, college, or university.
step2.enter_field_of_study: Enter your field of study or major.
step2.education_start_date: Enter the start date of your education.
step2.education_end_date: Enter the end date of your education.
step2.valid_phone_required: A valid phone number is required.
step2.another_name_info: Provide information if you have another name.

step3.required_fields: All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
step3.provide_employment_info: Please provide your employment history starting from the most recent. To add additional employers, click the 'Add' icon.
step3.required_name_of_your_employer: Name of your employer is required.
step3.from_date_info: Enter the start date of your employment.
step3.end_date_info: Enter the end date of your employment.
step3.valid_phone_required: A valid phone number is required.
step3.official_job_title_info: Enter your current official job title.
step3.type_of_employment_info: Enter the type of your employment.
step3.different_company_names_info: Enter the different names of the company.

step4.required_fields: All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
step4.provide_additional_professional_qualific: Please provide your additional professional qualifications.
step4.enter_license_or_certificate_number: Enter the license or certificate number.
step4.required_license_or_certificate_number: License or certificate number is required.
step4.provide_award_name_description: Provide the award name and description.
step4.required_award_name_description: Award name and description are required.
step4.does_this_qualification_have_an_expirati: Does this qualification have an expiration date?
step4.file_description_info: Enter a description for the uploaded file.

step5.required_license_or_certificate_number: License or certificate number is required.
step5.provide_award_name_description: Provide the award name and description.
step5.required_award_name_description: Award name and description are required.

step6.authorization_consent: By signing below, you consent to the processing of your personal data as described in this disclosure.
step6.required_fields: All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
step6.provide_employment_info: Please provide your employment history starting from the most recent. To add additional employers, click the 'Add' icon.
step6.signature_instruction: Please sign electronically to authorize the disclosure and processing of your information.
step6.certify_signature: I certify that the above signature is my electronic signature.
step6.email_privacy_info: We may occasionally need to contact you to clarify some items in your background verification process. We will not share or sell your email address.
step6.certify_identification: I certify that the information provided is accurate to the best of my knowledge.
step6.understand_electronic_means: I understand that electronic signatures carry the same weight as handwritten signatures.
